trans-unit.source: ATFile file field and ATImage image field are now language independend. Later I will add a I18NImage and I18NFile if needed. Having a seperate type for language dependend content for file and image is in my opinion easier to understand for people. Besides it’s like Zope3. [tiran]
trans-unit.target: ATFile file field and ATImage image field are now language independend. Later I will add a I18NImage and I18NFile if needed. Having a seperate type for language dependend content for file and image is in my opinion easier to understand for people. Besides it’s like Zope3. [tiran]

trans-unit.target: すべてのATCTContentベースのタイプに、欠落していた共有タブを追加しました。[tiran]

trans-unit.source: Added new Current Author criterion which, when used with the Creator index, gets all objects authored by the currently logged in user. Also fixed some permissions that were preventing normal users from viewing published topics. Fixes issue [ 1176355 ]. [alecm]
trans-unit.target: Creator インデックスと一緒に使用すると、現在ログインしているユーザーが作成したすべてのオブジェクトを取得する新しい現在の作成者基準を追加しました。また、通常のユーザーが公開されたトピックを表示するのを妨げていたいくつかのパーミッションを修正しました。問題[1176355]を修正しました。alecm]

trans-unit.source: Added new path criterion for use with ExtendedPathIndex that allows users to select paths to search in using a sitemap. This now uses the lovely ATReferenceBrowserWidget. [alecm]
trans-unit.target: サイトマップを使用して検索するパスを選択できるように、ExtendedPathIndex で使用するための新しいパス基準を追加しました。これは、素敵な ATReferenceBrowserWidget を使用するようになりました。[alecm]

trans-unit.source: Added new upload via url feature to upload a file or image using an url. The file is downloaded from the remote server using urllib2. Since this feature isn’t finished it’s not available by default. [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Added new upload via url feature to upload a file or image using an url. The file is downloaded from the remote server using urllib2. Since this feature isn’t finished it’s not available by default. [tiran]

trans-unit.source: Added version migration system mostly copied from plone. Works automatically during Plone 2.1 migration to bring plone 2.0 sites that started with ATCT >= 0.2 up to date including changing and uncatalogging ATTopic criteria and migrating CMF Topics. [alecm]

trans-unit.source: Added workaround for broken WebDAV/FTP clients like Mac OS X Finder. PUT_factory is patched to use the default_PUT_factory which creates standard Zope objects instead of CMF/AT content objects. Thx to Nate and ATAudio for the idea. [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Mac OS X の Finder のような壊れた WebDAV/FTP クライアントの回避策を追加しました。PUT_factory が CMF/AT コンテンツオブジェクトの代わりに標準の Zope オブジェクトを作成する default_PUT_factory を使うようにパッチされました。NateさんとATAudioさんのアイデアに感謝します。[tiran]

trans-unit.source: Added workarounds for EXIF MakerNote errors. Some cameras are really broken. Better no make notes than no exif infos at all. [tiran]

trans-unit.target: プロセスフォームが利用可能であれば check_ids を使用して id の競合をチェックするように変更しました。

trans-unit.target: Changed some status messages to type ‘error’. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Changed the behavior of the date criteria to make the meaning of each field clearer. Now queries like ‘More than 2 weeks ago’ can be used, and will behave as expected. This causes some inconsistency in importing CMFTopics. Queries that were of the form ‘min’ ‘x days’ ‘ago’ are now ‘less than x days ago’ which is a min:max query with an upper limit of now. The same goes for ‘max’ ‘x days’ ‘ahead’, all other queries should be close to identical (modulo an earliestTime() where it makes sense). The inconsistency shouldn’t be too important as the CMF date criteria was entirely inscrutable. Also changed some strings for criteria descriptions for consistency. Fixes bug [ 1181418 ]. Thanks to Dean Jackson for filing this bug and devising a reasonably usable UI. [alecm]
trans-unit.target: Changed the behavior of the date criteria to make the meaning of each field clearer. Now queries like ‘More than 2 weeks ago’ can be used, and will behave as expected. This causes some inconsistency in importing CMFTopics. Queries that were of the form ‘min’ ‘x days’ ‘ago’ are now ‘less than x days ago’ which is a min:max query with an upper limit of now. The same goes for ‘max’ ‘x days’ ‘ahead’, all other queries should be close to identical (modulo an earliestTime() where it makes sense). The inconsistency shouldn’t be too important as the CMF date criteria was entirely inscrutable. Also changed some strings for criteria descriptions for consistency. Fixes bug [ 1181418 ]. Thanks to Dean Jackson for filing this bug and devising a reasonably usable UI. [alecm]

trans-unit.source: Changed the way ConstrainTypes gets mixed in: Now ATCT is always subclassing folders from the ConstrainTypes class and the schema is always in the folder schema. Before this change ppl couldn’t rely on the api. When the feature is disabled the fields are not shown in the schema and the overwritten methods are using a “shortcut” to the default methods. [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Changed the way ConstrainTypes gets mixed in: Now ATCT is always subclassing folders from the ConstrainTypes class and the schema is always in the folder schema. Before this change ppl couldn’t rely on the api. When the feature is disabled the fields are not shown in the schema and the overwritten methods are using a “shortcut” to the default methods. trans-unit.source: Fixed http://members.plone.org/collector/4321 which was caused by three distinct bugs. 1) The initial rename of the CMF object didn’t preserve order, but rather moved the object to the end of the list. 2) When migrating folders the check for orderability on self.new always failed because self.new is None at this point, so ordering wasn’t attempted. 3) When going through the subobjects of a folder the position was noted, and then the object deleted, the next object was now in the same position as the prior one and the order was lost. Now there is a seperate loop to delete the objects after the loop which marks the order and preserves the object. [alecm]
trans-unit.target: Fixed http://members.plone.org/collector/4321 which was caused by three distinct bugs. 1) The initial rename of the CMF object didn’t preserve order, but rather moved the object to the end of the list. 2) When migrating folders the check for orderability on self.new always failed because self.new is None at this point, so ordering wasn’t attempted. 3) When going through the subobjects of a folder the position was noted, and then the object deleted, the next object was now in the same position as the prior one and the order was lost. Now there is a seperate loop to delete the objects after the loop which marks the order and preserves the object. [alecm]

trans-unit.source: Fixed problem with _getPortalTypeName in initializeArchetype() phase of object creation. Before the fix the portal type name was the original type name (e.g. ATDocument) because it was changed after the initializeArchetype call by the portal types tool. This issue has caused some wired problems with LinguaPlone and workflows. [tiran]
trans-unit.target: オブジェクト作成の initializeArchetype()フェーズの _getPortalTypeName の問題を修正しました。修正前のポータル タイプ名は、ポータル タイプ ツールによる initializeArchetype 呼び出しの後に変更されていたため、元のタイプ名 (例:ATDocument)になっていました。この問題は、LinguaPlone とワークフローでいくつかの有線の問題を引き起こしていました。[tiran]

trans-unit.source: Fixed two issues with PathCriterion. It was using depth 0 to get subfolders, the proper parameter is depth -1. Also, in order to properly handle the references it holds, it must itself be cataloged in the UID catalog, and have its references cataloged. [alecm]
trans-unit.target: PathCriterionの2つの問題を修正しました。サブフォルダを取得するために深さ0を使用していましたが、適切なパラメータは深さ-1です。また、保持している参照を適切に処理するためには、それ自体がUIDカタログにカタログ化され、その参照がカタログ化されていなければなりません。[alecm]

trans-unit.source: Made manage_afterPUT and manage_afterMKCOL use PATH_INFO to get at the original id for usage in the Title, so that in a WebDAV name-mangling environment the Title gets set to the original filename. [sidnei]

trans-unit.source: Made migration more tolerant of conflicting ids due to auto-created content from manage_afterAdd or similar. Fixes http://plone.org/collector/4468 [alecm]
trans-unit.target: Made migration more tolerant of conflicting ids due to auto-created content from manage_afterAdd or similar. Fixes http://plone.org/collector/4468 [alecm]

trans-unit.source: Made portal_type, selection, and reference criteria return reasonably sorted lists. [alecm]
trans-unit.target: portal_type,selection,reference criteriaが合理的にソートされたリストを返すようにした。[alecm]

trans-unit.source: Made the ‘view’ method aliases point to ‘(selected layout)’ instead of ‘(default view)’. This assures consistency with previous behaviour, so that /view at the end of a URL always gets the item itself, ignoring any default-page that may be set. Note that the ‘view’ action still points to ‘string:${object_url}’, so that the ‘view’ tab, as well as the ‘(Default)’ target, still get ‘(dynamic view)’ (and thus default pages) for types other than File and Image. [optilude]
trans-unit.target: Made the ‘view’ method aliases point to ‘(selected layout)’ instead of ‘(default view)’. This assures consistency with previous behaviour, so that /view at the end of a URL always gets the item itself, ignoring any default-page that may be set. Note that the ‘view’ action still points to ‘string:${object_url}’, so that the ‘view’ tab, as well as the ‘(Default)’ target, still get ‘(dynamic view)’ (and thus default pages) for types other than File and Image. [optilude]

trans-unit.source: Made the criteria to index type mapping a little more sane. [alecm]
trans-unit.target: インデックス型のマッピングの基準をもう少しまともにしました。[alecm]

trans-unit.source: Made the portal_types criteria work properly with either Types or portal_types indexes. Disabled types restrictions in TopicTool, now uses the new Plone 2.1 search blacklist for types (site_properties.unfriendly_types). This creates a plone 2.1 dependency. Also a change was made to the atct_subtopic_form so that it now uses a macro from plone 2.1, this fixes issue [ 1164541 ]. [alecm]
trans-unit.target: portal_types の基準が Types または portal_types インデックスのいずれかで正しく動作するようにしました。TopicToolでタイプの制限を無効にし、新しいPlone 2.1の検索ブラックリストを使用するようになりました (site_properties.unfriendly_types)。これにより、Plone 2.1の依存関係が作成されます。また、atct_subtopic_formに変更が加えられ、plone 2.1のマクロを使用するようになりました。[alecm]

trans-unit.target: トピックの移行と基準の強化を移植し、エンダートピックブランチから基準を追加しました。素晴らしい仕事をしてくれた Alec Mitchell に感謝します。新しい基準は以下のとおりです。ATSelectionCriterion、ATDateRangeCriterion、ATReferenceCriterion、および ATBooleanCriterion です。allecm,tiran]

trans-unit.source: Prevent topic-criteria from having unicode as id. A unicode-id broke indexing the criteria in ZCatalog since obj.getPhysicalPath() prefers obj.id over obj.getId() in zope4. [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: トピック基準がunicodeをidとして持つことを防ぐ。zope4ではobj.getPhysicalPath()がobj.idをobj.getId()よりもobj.idを優先するため、ZCatalogではunicodeのidが基準のインデックス作成を壊していました。[pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Products.ATContentTypes.content.folder.ATBTreeFolder is now deprecated. Normal ATFolders (as implemented in plone.app.folder) are now suitable for storing large numbers of items in most cases. If you need a folder that doesn’t track order at all, use a normal ATFolder (from plone.app.folder) with the ordering attribute set to u’unordered’. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Products.ATContentTypes.content.folder.ATBTreeFolder is now deprecated. Normal ATFolders (as implemented in plone.app.folder) are now suitable for storing large numbers of items in most cases. If you need a folder that doesn’t track order at all, use a normal ATFolder (from plone.app.folder) with the ordering attribute set to u’unordered’. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Removed the view alias of index.html for all standard content types. This makes it possible to create and upload files called index.html to the site, which is quite common when batch importing old sites into the site. trans-unit.source: Zope4 compatibility. Fixed tests in combination with Zope 4.0b4. Do not call views in TAL. Fix checkPermission call (it was acquired from portal_membership until CMF 2.3). Fix doctests to adapt to changes in http-headers. [davisagli, pbauer, maurits] (#50)
